Articles.Content:
Taken from the Ram Air Intake part.cfg:

MODULE

{

name = ModuleResourceIntake

resourceName = IntakeAir

checkForOxygen = true

area = 0.01

intakeSpeed = 10

intakeTransformName = Intake

}

I assume the checkForOxygen can only be used in the ModuleResourceIntake MODULE?

But I could change IntakeAir to e.g. Oxidizer?

What does intakeTransformName do - what could I do with it?

How would I check if I am in the water - or on a specific planet?
